<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Avenge Ally](/Feats.aspx?ID=4419) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 49 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once every 10 minutes

**Requirements**
You are within 30 feet of an ally with the dying condition

</column>

---

Though you know that you will eventually outlive your companions, seeing them at death's door brings clarity to your attacks. Make a [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=89). Roll twice on the attack roll and use the higher result.
name: Avenge Ally
requirement: You are within 30 feet of an ally with the dying condition
